name: RI_1_1_16_Destroy_Delete_Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.16 Destroy/Delete Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
description: Destroy/Delete Record Entries (1 or more instances)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent causes the system to permanently erase record entry content from the system. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.16.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to delete (destroy) Record Entries (e.g., those exceeding their legal retention period) according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: RI.1.1.16#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to tag Record Entries as missing.
